comments.body: Could we combine some of the standard tests for all types of buttons we have? I imagine basic things like sizing, gesture recognition, semantics and ink splash would behave the same.
Both the button implementations and their tests could be factored better. That would be a separate PR.
FYI: see also [within](https://docs.flutter.io/flutter/flutter_test/within.html) utility, which supports `Size`.
That might make the test clearer however I'm going to leave this alone for now because it matches similar code in buttons_test.dart that will get update when #12357 is fixed.
